refnamediv.refpurpose: Edit LDB databases using your favorite editor

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: ldbrename is a utility that allows you to rename trees in an LDB database based by DN. This utility takes two arguments: the original DN name of the top element and the DN to change it to.

listitem.para: LDB URL to connect to. See ldb(7) for details.
Extra ldb options, such as modules.
LDB URL to connect to (can be overrided by using the -H command-line option.)

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 4.0 of the Samba suite.

refentry.refsect1:
